dq_002.title: The City’s Smile
dq_002.summary: You pleased Loki enough to continue. Now Dreadheim City must learn your name—through fear, not kindness.
steps: Enter Dreadheim City and blend in like a predator.
Make a citizen obey you without raising your voice.
Leave the city with a token taken, not given.
